products.title: 240ML BPA-Free Anti-Colic Baby Bottle Wide-Neck PP Plastic
products.body_html:
Feeding time should be simple, but it often becomes messy and stressful without the right tools. Spilled milk, bottles that don't seal properly, and nipples that cause colic or gas can quickly frustrate both parent and child. The 240ML Baby Bottle changes that reality by offering a practical, safe, and comfortable feeding solution built to keep babies happy and parents stress-free.

Thoughtfully designed with both function and comfort in mind, the 240ML Baby Bottle provides an easy-to-hold structure, a natural nipple shape, and an anti-colic vent system. Its size is ideal for growing babies, while its lightweight and durable construction makes it just as convenient for home use as for travel. Parents can finally enjoy smoother feeding sessions without worrying about leaks or discomfort.




WHAT MAKES THE 240ML BABY BOTTLE DIFFERENT


✅ ANTI-COLIC TECHNOLOGY – Built with a venting system that prevents air intake, reducing gas and discomfort. Babies experience calmer, happier feeds, and parents enjoy more peaceful nights.

✅ SAFE & DURABLE MATERIAL—The 240ML baby bottle is made with BPA-free, high-quality plastic that resists wear and tear. Parents can trust it to last through daily use while keeping every feed safe.




✅ NATURAL NIPPLE DESIGN – Created to mimic breastfeeding, easing the transition between breast and bottle. This reduces feeding resistance and helps maintain a natural feeding rhythm.

✅ EASY TO CLEAN – The wide-mouth opening makes cleaning and sterilizing quick and thorough. Parents save valuable time while ensuring the 240ML Baby Bottle always remains hygienic.





✅ PERFECT SIZE FOR FEEDING – 240ML The bottle balances capacity and convenience, holding just the right amount for a growing baby. It's compact enough for diaper bags, making feeding on the go stress-free.



SIMPLE TO USE 240ML BABY BOTTLE


1. Fill the 240ML Baby Bottle with milk or formula.

2. Secure the leak-proof lid and nipple.

3. Feed your baby comfortably at home or on the go.

4. Clean with ease and reuse for the next feeding.


Research shows that over 65% of parents face daily feeding challenges like gas, bottle leakage, or nipple rejection. Without the 240ML Baby Bottle, these struggles lead to restless nights, wasted formula, and added frustration during an already busy routine.

Families using the 240ML Baby Bottle report smoother feeding sessions, less fussiness, and more time enjoying their baby instead of troubleshooting feeding issues. With its anti-colic design, natural nipple, and reliable build, this bottle gives parents peace of mind while making every meal a positive experience.



PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS


Material: BPA-free PP Plastic

Colors: Blue, Pink, Yellow, Green

Package Size: 180 x 110 x 60 mm

Care Instructions: Wash and disinfect before each use; store away from insects and bacteria in a sanitary place.

* Ergonomic shape makes holding and feeding easier for both parents and babies

* Easy-to-clean wide mouth simplifies sterilization and daily cleaning

2. Ensure anti-bloating vent is properly secured before feeding.

3. Use nipple mode for newborns and switch to learning cup mode as your child grows.

5. Store in a clean, dry place when not in use.

products.body_html:
MamiSure Disposable Baby Cups combine convenience, safety, and smart design to create a stress-free feeding solution for both mothers and babies. Thoughtfully crafted with premium PPSU material and ergonomic features, this cup-and-bottle system supports different feeding stages while ensuring hygienic and comfortable use every time.

 

Smart Design Features

* Premium PPSU Material – Heat-resistant, durable, and lightweight, perfect for repeated sterilization and safe daily feeding

* Mother’s Milk Straw Design – Mimics natural breastfeeding, reducing nipple confusion and supporting smooth transitions

* Shock-Resistant Wide Mouth – Easy to fill, clean, and resistant to drops, ensuring longevity and safety

* Factory Handle – Ergonomic grip allows little hands to learn self-feeding while providing extra stability

* Period Feeding Adaptability – Designed to support various feeding stages, from newborn nutrition to early self-drinking

* Hygienic Disposable Cup Option – Perfect for travel, daycare, or on-the-go feeding without compromising safety

Setup and Usage

1. Assemble bottle by attaching the milk straw securely to the PPSU body

2. Fill with expressed milk, formula, or other baby-safe liquids

3. Ensure the handle and straw are firmly locked in place

4. For disposable cups, simply use once and discard for maximum hygiene

5. Clean PPSU bottles with warm water or sterilizer after each use

Product Specifications

* Material: Medical-grade PPSU (bottle) + food-safe silicone straw

* Style: Wide-mouth bottle with detachable straw and ergonomic handle

* Colors: Neutral and pastel tones suitable for boys and girls

products.title: USB Baby Bottle Warmer | Compact On-the-Go Milk Heater
products.body_html:
A busy household often struggles with bottle feeding when controlling temperature isn't easy. Waiting for water to warm up, dealing with uneven heating, or rushing to prepare a bottle in the middle of the night can quickly become a stressful experience for both parent and baby. The Baby USB Bottle solves this challenge by offering quick, consistent, and portable warming, ensuring your little one's milk or formula is always at the perfect temperature.


USB Baby Bottle Warmer Compact On-the-Go Milk Heater is engineered for convenience and adaptability, this bottle is powered by USB, making it usable at home, in the car, or while traveling. Its lightweight and compact design allows parents to carry it anywhere without needing bulky warmers or unreliable hot water methods. With its blend of modern technology and parent-focused practicality, feeding becomes smoother, faster, and far less stressful.




 




WHY IT MAKES A DIFFERENCE BABY USB BOTTLE


✅ USB-POWERED CONVENIENCE—It runs on any USB port, from a laptop to a power bank or car charger. This ensures reliable warming wherever you are, even without access to a traditional outlet.

✅ FAST HEATING TECHNOLOGY – Quickly warms milk or formula to the ideal temperature. This means less waiting and fewer tears from a hungry baby who needs feeding immediately.




✅ PORTABLE & LIGHTWEIGHT—It is small and easy to carry in diaper bags or travel kits. Parents can feed their baby comfortably during trips, outings, or overnight stays without hassle.

✅ SAFE & EVEN HEATING—This device prevents overheating and warms milk evenly. This protects essential nutrients in formula or breastmilk, giving your baby safe and nourishing meals.


 


✅ EASY TO USE & CLEAN—The bottle's Simple design makes operation straightforward, and it is easy to wash. Parents spend less time preparing and more time bonding with their child.


 

SIMPLE TO USE BABY USB BOTTLE


1. Connect the USB cable to a power source.

2. Place the bottle into the warmer.

3. Wait for the milk or formula to reach the right temperature.

4. Feed your baby quickly and stress-free.

Studies show 72% of parents struggle with bottle preparation during nighttime feedings. The biggest frustrations are long wait times and inconsistent warming. Many resort to makeshift methods like boiling water or microwaving, which are inconvenient and unsafe, often leading to spills, burns, or wasted formula.

The Baby USB Bottle eliminates those struggles by offering fast, portable, and reliable heating anywhere. Parents who use it report calmer feedings, fewer nighttime disruptions, and greater confidence knowing their baby's milk is warmed safely and evenly every time.

Its ergonomic handle and flexible design make cleaning easier and more efficient, saving parents time and effort. Perfect for daily use at home or on the go, the WiggleTots brush keeps all feeding items spotless.

  • Durable & Long-Lasting: Built to withstand regular use.

Ensure your baby’s feeding gear stays clean and safe with the WiggleTots Silicone Baby Bottle Brush.
